abstract: Shares of Moody’s slumped Thursday after Berkshire Hathaway, run by the legendary investor Warren Buffett, reported that it had lowered its stake in the credit-rating agency.
snippet: Shares of Moody’s slumped Thursday after Berkshire Hathaway, run by the legendary investor Warren Buffett, reported that it had lowered its stake in the credit-rating agency.
lead_paragraph: Is the Oracle of Omaha cutting his rating on Moody’s Corporation?
